name: Angelina Nissim
summary: Former lawyer with experience in contract law transitioning into IT. Self-studied MS SQL and currently pursuing web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript). Completed MASA Web Development Course with a focus on Front-end development; internship as Front End Developer with React and Angular.

experience.title: Front End Developer Intern
experience.description: Redesigned all tables in the project per the layout in Figma to improve UX; created a component library (inputs, selectors, icons) to improve DX; rewritten the login page (frontend and backend).

experience.title: SQL Freelancer
experience.description: Compilation of SQL queries; ensured operation of databases.

experience.title: Legal Adviser
experience.description: Created and edited over 200 contracts; Negotiated with more than 10 counterparties, including government agencies; User of corporate database systems.
